description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 22 May 2020 (RN 19/09542/FULL) for the excavation to extend basement, erection of extensions at ground, first and second floor levels. Alterations to roof including installation of plant equipment and alterations to rooflights, from RN 19/09542/FULL, NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to allow an enlargement to the basement extension, amend the fenestration on elevations 2 and 4, new smaller extension to the office on the right side of rear elevation and amend the rear terrace.
